title: Lukas
description: Storm’s younger cousin.Vandal’s little brother.You’ve met him in the background.The sweet one. The nice one. The one they can all rely on.The good one.He’s a tattoo artist. He plays metal and classical music - on the violin.He’s got a body built for sin.He’s 24.In comes Ivy. She’s a 36 year old single mom who hasn’t dated in 18 years. All she wanted was a tattoo.She got a helluva lot more :) Being good has never been so bad.
author: Carian Cole
